overview: The Danish documentary 'Niels Bohr: The World's Best Man' is about the world-renowned Danish physicist Niels Bohr. Here we delve into his life, work and the legacy he has created. Niels Bohr is known for making fundamental contributions to the understanding of atomic structure and quantum theory, and the film draws a portrait of a man who in the 20th century probably left the biggest mark on the world.
title: Niels Bohr - Verdens bedste menneske
